casebody.data:
Third Department,

November, 1940.

(November 13, 1940.) Fred M. Crain, Plaintiff, v. Emanuel Weinberg and Fannie Weinberg and Others, Defendants.

Motion to extend time within which to perfect appeal granted. Motion for stay denied. Present — Hill, P. J., Bliss, Heffeman, Sehenck and Foster, JJ.
